nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars Brickmaster: Battle for the Stolen Crystals

LEGO Star Wars Brickmaster: Battle for the Stolen Crystals is a children's book released on August 19, 2013. It introduced the KD81 Cargo Skiff, the WT-RT, the Vespula Fighter, the PH-STAP, the Desert Speeder, and the Ice Speeder to canon.

Star Wars® and LEGO® fans alike can join forces with Commander Gree to defeat the deadly commando droid. Including 180 bricks and two minifigures, LEGO® Star Wars®: Battle for the Stolen Crystals Brickmaster allows young fans to play out the thrilling four-part adventure story by building the models and taking them apart to build the next one.

Now with 80 pages, this all-new LEGO Star Wars brickmaster includes clear step-by-step building instructions along with an exciting new story where kids can experience the adventure through their creations.
